If the request is successful, then this action returns a value of Success.

AcknowledgeWithinDays.description: Number of days the supplier can decide to accept or reject the purchase order.
AcknowledgeWithinDays.title: Acknowledge Within Days

AcknowledgmentDueDate.description: Date that the application requests the supplier to acknowledge the purchase order.
AcknowledgmentDueDate.title: Acknowledgment Due Date

BillToBU.description: Business unit that processes supplier invoices for the purchase order.
BillToBU.title: Bill-to BU

BillToBUId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the business unit that processes supplier invoices for the purchase order.

BillToLocation.description: Bill-to location where the supplier must send the invoice.
BillToLocation.title: Bill-to Location

BillToLocationId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the bill-to location.

Buyer.description: Person who is responsible for managing the purchase order.
Buyer.title: Buyer

BuyerId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the buyer.

BuyerManagedTransportFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the buyer or an agent that the buyer designates must arrange transportation, from picking up the requested item to delivering it to the ship-to location that the purchase order specifies. If false, then the supplier must arrange transportation.
BuyerManagedTransportFlag.title: Buyer Managed Transportation

Carrier.description: Company that transports the item through land, sea, or air.
Carrier.title: Carrier

CarrierId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the company that transports the item through land, sea, or air.

ConfirmingOrderFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the document confirms that the supplier is aware of the purchase order. If false, then the supplier is not aware of the purchase order.
ConfirmingOrderFlag.title: Confirming Order

ConversionRateType.description: Rate type that the application uses to determine the currency conversion rate for the purchase order.
ConversionRateType.title: Conversion Rate Type

CreationDate.description: Date and time when the buyer or application creates the purchase order.
CreationDate.title: Creation Date

CurrencyCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the purchase order currency.

DFF.description: The Flexfields for Purchase Orders resource manages additional details about purchase orders.
DFF.title: Flexfields for Purchase Orders

FOB.description: Free on board. Location where ownership of the item transfers from the supplier to the buyer.
FOB.title: FOB

FOBCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the type of term for free on board for the item.
FOBCode.title: FOB

FreightTerms.description: Terms that describe who pays charges to transport the item.
FreightTerms.title: Freight Terms

FreightTermsCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the type of freight terms for the purchase order.
FreightTermsCode.title: Freight Terms

MasterContractId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the contract from enterprise contracts. This attribute allows a direct connection between execution documents in Oracle Purchasing Cloud and high-level contracts in Oracle Enterprise Contracts Cloud.

MasterContractNumber.description: Number that identifies the contract from enterprise contracts. This attribute allows a direct connection between execution documents in Oracle Purchasing Cloud and high-level contracts in Oracle Enterprise Contracts Cloud.
MasterContractNumber.title: Master Contract

MasterContractType.description: Type of contract. This attribute specifies the nature of the enterprise contract. The contract type specifies what kind of information you can enter including the presence of lines and contract terms.
MasterContractType.title: Master Contract Type

MasterContractTypeId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the contract type. This attribute specifies the nature of the enterprise contract. The contract type specifies what kind of information you can enter including the presence of lines and contract terms.

ModeOfTransport.description: Mode of transport that the shipper uses to transport the item, such as land, sea, or air.
ModeOfTransport.title: Mode of Transport

ModeOfTransportCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the mode of transport.

NoteToReceiver.description: Note that the receiver can read to get details about how to process the purchase order.
NoteToReceiver.title: Note to Receiver

NoteToSupplier.description: Note that the supplier can read to get details about how to process the purchase order.
NoteToSupplier.title: Note to Supplier

OrderNumber.description: Number that uniquely identifies the purchase order in the sold-to legal entity.
OrderNumber.title: Order

Ordered.description: Total of the amounts from the purchase order lines. Do not include exclusive taxes.
Ordered.title: Ordered

POHeaderId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the purchase order.

PayOnReceiptFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the application creates an invoice that requests payment for the item according to the receipt transaction. If false, then the application does not require the supplier to create this invoice and instead requests payment according to the receipt of the shipped item.
PayOnReceiptFlag.title: Pay on Receipt

PaymentTerms.description: Terms that the application uses to schedule payments and calculate due dates, discount dates, and discount amounts for each invoice against the purchase order.
PaymentTerms.title: Payment Terms

PaymentTermsId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the payment terms.

ProcurementBU.description: Business unit that manages and owns the purchase order.
ProcurementBU.title: Procurement BU

ProcurementBUId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the business unit that manages and owns the purchase order.

ReferenceNumber.description: Document number of the purchase order that the import imported from the legacy application into Oracle Purchasing Cloud.
ReferenceNumber.title: Reference Number

RequiredAcknowledgment.description: Acknowledgment that the application requires from the supplier. Values include Document and Schedule when supplier must acknowledge the header and schedule of the purchase order, Document when supplier must acknowledge the header of the purchase order, or None when the purchase order does not require acknowledgment.
RequiredAcknowledgment.title: Required Acknowledgment

RequiredAcknowledgmentCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the acknowledgment that the purchase order requires from the supplier. Values include Y for document and schedule, D for document, or N for none.
RequiredAcknowledgmentCode.title: Required Acknowledgment

RequiresSignatureFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the purchase order requires signatures to meet legal requirements. If false, then the purchase order does not require signatures.
RequiresSignatureFlag.title: Allow Substitute Receipts

RequisitioningBU.description: Business unit that creates the requisition.
RequisitioningBU.title: Requisitioning BU

RequisitioningBUId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the business unit that creates the requisition.

Revision.description: Versions of the purchase order that requires communication to and, as an option, get acknowledgment from the supplier.
Revision.title: Revision

ServiceLevel.description: Priority that determines how quickly to transport the item.
ServiceLevel.title: Service Level

ServiceLevelCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the service level for the shipping method.

ShippingMethod.description: Transportation method for the carrier or service level for the purchase order. For example, ABC Shipping - AIR - 2nd Day.
ShippingMethod.title: Shipping Method

SoldToLegalEntity.description: Party who is financially responsible for purchases on the purchase order.
SoldToLegalEntity.title: Sold-to Legal Entity

SoldToLegalEntityId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the legal entity that is financially responsible for purchases on the purchase order.

Status.description: Status of the purchase order relative to the purchase order life cycle.
Status.title: Status

StatusCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the purchase order status in the order life cycle.
StatusCode.title: Status Code

SupplierContact.description: Person who represents the supplier when communicating with the buyer.
SupplierContact.title: Supplier Contact

SupplierContactId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the supplier contact.

SupplierId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the supplier.

SupplierOrder.description: Document number that the supplier created for the purchase order.
SupplierOrder.title: Supplier Order

SupplierSite.description: Location that the supplier uses to purchase the item.
SupplierSite.title: Supplier Site

SupplierSiteId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the supplier site.

Total.description: Ordered amount plus the exclusive tax amounts for the purchase order.
Total.title: Total

TotalTax.description: Exclusive tax amount that the purchase can recover and not recover for the purchase order.
TotalTax.title: Total Tax

attachments.description: The Attachments for Purchase Orders resource manage attachments for a purchase order.
attachments.title: Attachments for Purchase Orders

lines.description: The Lines resource manages purchasing details, such as the item to purchase, quantity, unit of measure, and price.
lines.title: Lines

PoLineId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the purchase order line.

_FLEX_NumOfSegments.description: Descriptive flexfield number of segments for purchase order.

_FLEX_NumOfVisibleSegments.description: Descriptive flexfield number of visible segments for purchase order.

_FLEX_ValidationDate.description: Descriptive flexfield validation date for purchase order.

__FLEX_Context.description: Descriptive flexfield context name for purchase order.

Category.description: Name of the purchasing category that the purchase order uses to classify the purchase for the order line.
Category.title: Category Name

CategoryCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the purchasing category.

CategoryId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the purchasing category.

ConsignmentLineFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the item on the purchase order is under consignment. If false, then the item is not under consignment.
ConsignmentLineFlag.title: Consignment Line

CurrencyCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the purchase order currency.

DFF.description: The Flexfields for Purchase Orders resource manages additional details about purchase orders.
DFF.title: Flexfields for Purchase Orders

Description.description: Description of the item that the purchase order references.
Description.title: Description

HazardClass.description: Name of the hazard class that is used to identify and classify hazardous materials to comply with the safety regulations.
HazardClass.title: Hazard Class

HazardClassCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the hazard class.
HazardClassCode.title: Code

HazardClassId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the hazard class.

Item.description: Abbreviation that uniquely identifies the item on the purchase order.
Item.title: Item

ItemId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the item on the purchase order.

LineNumber.description: Number that uniquely identifies the purchase order line.
LineNumber.title: Line

LineType.description: Type that indicates whether the purchase order line references an item or a service.
LineType.title: Line Type

LineTypeId.description: Value that uniquely identifies whether the purchase order line references an item or a service.

Manufacturer.description: Name of the manufacturer of the item.
Manufacturer.title: Manufacturer

ManufacturerPartNumber.description: Number issued by the manufacturer that uniquely identifies the individual product.
ManufacturerPartNumber.title: Manufacturer Part Number

MaximumRetainageAmount.description: Maximum amount of retainage that can be withheld on a contract line.
MaximumRetainageAmount.title: Maximum Retainage Amount

NegotiatedFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the buyer and the supplier negotiated and agreed on the price before the purchase. If false, then the buyer and the supplier did not negotiate the price before the purchase.
NegotiatedFlag.title: Negotiated

NoteToSupplier.description: Note that the supplier can read to get details about how to process the order line on the purchase order.
NoteToSupplier.title: Note to Supplier

OrderNumber.description: Number that uniquely identifies the purchase order in the sold-to legal entity.
OrderNumber.title: Order

Ordered.description: Price multiplied by quantity. The purchase order uses this value when the purchase order line contains a quantity. If the purchase order line references a fixed price service, then this attribute contains the same value that the scheduled amount contains.
Ordered.title: Ordered

POHeaderId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the purchase order.

POLineId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the purchase order line.

Price.description: Price of the purchase order line.
Price.title: Price

Quantity.description: Quantity of the item on the order line.
Quantity.title: Quantity

SourceAgreementId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the source agreement that the purchase order line references.

SourceAgreementLine.description: Number that uniquely identifies the source agreement line that the purchase order line references.
SourceAgreementLine.title: Source Agreement Line

SourceAgreementLineId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the source agreement line that the purchase order line references.

SourceAgreementNumber.description: Number that uniquely identifies the source agreement that the purchase order line references.
SourceAgreementNumber.title: Source Agreement

SourceAgreementType.description: Specifies whether the agreement is a blanket purchase agreement or a contract purchase agreement.
SourceAgreementType.title: Source Agreement Document Type

SourceAgreementTypeCode.description: Source agreement type. For example, CONTRACT or BLANKET.

Status.description: Status of the purchase order line.

StatusCode.title: Line Status

SupplierConfigurationId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the configured item that the requester created in the supplier application when creating the requisition.
SupplierConfigurationId.title: Supplier Configuration ID

SupplierItem.description: Number that the supplier uses to identify the item on the purchase order line.
SupplierItem.title: Supplier Item

Total.description: Ordered amount plus the exclusive tax amounts on the purchase order line.
Total.title: Total

TotalTax.description: Total of the exclusive tax amounts that the purchaser can recover and not recover for the purchase order line.
TotalTax.title: Total Tax

UNNumber.description: Number that the United Nations uses to identify hazardous material.
UNNumber.title: UN Number

UNNumberDescription.description: Description of the hazardous material that the United Nations identification number references.
UNNumberDescription.title: UN Number Description

UNNumberId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the number that the United Nations uses to identify hazardous material.

UOM.description: Unit of measure that the item uses for the quantity.
UOM.title: UOM

WorkOrderProduct.description: Finished item that the work order in contract manufacturing creates.
WorkOrderProduct.title: Product

AccrueAtReceiptFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then accrue the purchase order schedule at receipt. If false, then do not accrue at receipt.
AccrueAtReceiptFlag.title: Accrue at Receipt

AllowSubstituteReceiptsFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the purchase order schedule allows the application to use a substitute item in place of the ordered item. If false, then the purchase order schedule does not allow a substitute item.
AllowSubstituteReceiptsFlag.title: Allow Substitute Receipts

BackToBackFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the sales order exists for the purchase order schedule, and use back-to back-fulfillment. The purchase order schedule fulfills the sales order upon receipt. If false, then the sales order does not exist for the purchase order schedule.
BackToBackFlag.title: Back-to-Back Order

DestinationType.description: Determines how to charge the item. Values include Inventory, Expense, Drop Ship, or Work Order.
DestinationType.title: Destination Type

DestinationTypeCode.title: Destination Type

EarlyReceiptToleranceDays.title: Early Receipt Tolerance in Days

InvoiceCloseTolerancePercent.description: Percent that the application uses to determine whether to close a purchase order schedule when the invoice invoices only part of the item.
InvoiceCloseTolerancePercent.title: Invoice Close Tolerance Percent

InvoiceMatchOption.description: Determines whether to match the invoice to the purchase order or the receipt. If the purchase order line is under consignment, then match each invoice to the consumption advice.
InvoiceMatchOption.title: Invoice Match Option

InvoiceMatchOptionCode.description: Determines whether the invoice for the purchase order schedule must match the purchase order or the receipt. Values include C for consumption advice, P for order, or R for receipt.
InvoiceMatchOptionCode.title: Invoice Match Option

LastAcceptDate.description: Last date when the receiver can receive the item.

LastAcceptableDeliveryDate.description: Last date when the shipper can deliver the item.

LastAcceptableShipDate.description: Last date when the shipper can ship the item.
LastAcceptableShipDate.title: Last Acceptable Ship Date

LateReceiptToleranceDays.description: Maximum number of days the application allows to receive a late shipment.
LateReceiptToleranceDays.title: Late Receipt Tolerance in Days

LineLocationId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the purchase order schedule.

LineNumber.description: Number that uniquely identifies the purchase order line.
LineNumber.title: Line

MatchApprovalLevelCode.description: Specifies how quantities on the purchase order, receipt, inspection, and invoice must match before the buyer can pay the invoice. Values include 2-Way, 3-Way, or 4-Way.

ModeOfTransport.description: Mode of transportation that ships the item, such as truck, air, or boat.
ModeOfTransport.title: Mode of Transport

ModeOfTransportCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the mode of transport.
ModeOfTransportCode.title: Mode of Transport

NoteToReceiver.description: Note that the receiver can read to get details about how to process the purchase order schedule.
NoteToReceiver.title: Note to Receiver

OrchestrationAgreementLineNumber.description: Number that identifies the orchestration agreement line.

OrchestrationAgreementNumber.title: Financial Orchestration Flow

OrderNumber.title: Order

Ordered.description: Price multiplied by the scheduled quantity. If the purchase order line references a fixed price service, then this attribute contains the same value that the scheduled amount contains.

OriginalPromisedDeliveryDate.title: Original Promised Delivery Date

OriginalPromisedShipDate.description: Date when the supplier promises to ship the item that the buyer ordered.
OriginalPromisedShipDate.title: Original Promised Ship Date

OverReceiptAction.title: Over-receipt Action

OverReceiptActionCode.title: Over-Receipt Action

ReceiptRoutingId.title: Receipt Routing

x-links.description:
List of trading partner item statuses.

The following properties are defined on the LOV link relation:

  • Source Attribute: TradingPartnerItemStatus; Target Attribute: Meaning
  • Source Attribute: PartStatusCode; Target Attribute: LookupCode

limit.description: This parameter restricts the number of resources returned inside the resource collection. If the limit exceeds the resource count then the framework will only return the available resources.

offset.description: Used to define the starting position of the resource collection. If offset exceeds the resource count then no resources are returned. Default value is 0.

totalResults.description: The resource collection representation will include the "estimated row count" when "?totalResults=true", otherwise the count is not included.  The default value is "false".

onlyData.description: The resource item payload will be filtered in order to contain only data (no links section, for example).

dependency.description:
This parameter specifies dependencies which are attributes that are set before and rolled back after generating the response. Generally they are used to preview the effects of an attribute change. The attributes specified in this parameter are always set in the resource instance in question. When a child resource collection is requested and the parameter is set, the attributes will be set in the parent resource instance before generating the resource collection payload. The value of this query parameter is a set of dependency attributes. Example: dependency=ProductId=2

Format: <attr1>=<val1>,<attr2>=<value2>

orderBy.description: This parameter orders a resource collection based on the specified attributes.  The parameter value is a comma-separated string of attribute names, each optionally followed by a colon and "asc" or "desc".  Specify "asc" for ascending and "desc" for descending. The default value is "asc".  For example, ?orderBy=field1:asc,field2:desc

links.description: The link relations associated with the resource instance.

Error.description: Text of the error messages that occurred during message transaction.

ErrorType.description: Value that identifies the type of error. Valid values include Object Retrieval and Outbound Processing.

MessageGUID.description: Value that uniquely identifies the message. It is generated by outbound processing and provided by an external partner in inbound messages.

MessageLogDetailId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the message log details. It is a primary key that the application generates.

MessageLogId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the message log.

ProcessingStartTime.description: Date and time when the processing starts.

RetryCount.description: Total number of attempts the application makes to deliver the message.

Status.description: Value that identifies the current state of the message. Values include Hold, Error, or Success.

AltDelMethodTypeFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the messages are processed with an alternate delivery method. If false, then the messages are been processed with primary delivery method. The default value is false.

ConfirmationStatus.description: Value that indicates the status of the confirmation message. Valid values include Received, Required, or Not Required.

CorrelationId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the correlation ID to be retrieved and added to processing configuration.

Direction.description: Value that indicates if the collaboration document operation is for an outbound or inbound collaboration.

DocumentId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the collaboration documents. It is a primary key that the application generates.

DocumentOperationId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the collaboration document operation.

Error.description: Text of the error messages that occurred during message transaction.

ErrorDescription.description: Value that describes the reason for the error for which the record processing failed.

ErrorType.description: Value that identifies the type of error. Valid values include Object Retrieval and Outbound Processing.

ExternalPartnerId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the external partner. It is a primary key that the application generates.

InputDocument.description: Value that identifies the original payload to be processed by Oracle Fusion Collaboration Messaging Framework for outbound processing.

KeyContext.description: Discriminator value that identifies the messages to be searched for in the collaboration messaging transactions log and the attributes that are used to search. Valid values include PurchaseOrderToSuppllier, InvoiceFromSupplier, and so on.

MessageGUID.description: Value that uniquely identifies the business-to-business message transaction. It has different prefix for outbound and inbound processing.

MessageId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the collaboration message. It is a primary key that the application generates.

MessageLogId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the business-to-business message transaction. It is a primary key that the application generates when it creates a message log record. This attribute is required.

MessageLogStatus.description: Value that identifies the current state of the message. For example, Undelivered.

MessageName.description: Name of the collaboration message. For example, OutboundProcessPurchaseOrder.

OutputDocument.description: Value that identifies the transformed payload  to be processed by Oracle Fusion Collaboration Messaging Framework for outbound processing.

PartnerKeyType.description: Value that identifies the types of application-specific partner keys. For example, Legal Entity or Supplier Site.

PartnerMessageId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the trading partner message. It is a primary key that the application generates.

PartnerMessageName.description: Name of the trading partner message.

PrimaryRecipientFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then log message is a primary message. If false, then log message is not a primary message. This attribute does not have a default value.

ProcessingCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the acknowledgement confirmation status of the trading partner.

ProcessingDetail.description: Describes the acknowledgment confirmation error or warning that occurred during message processing.

ProcessingDuration.description: Time taken to process the message.

PublicationId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the publication. This value is generated by outbound processing while publishing messages to trading partners.

RetryCount.description: Number of attempts made to deliver the message transaction.

SenderMessageId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the sender of the message.

SentAttachments.description: Number of attachments attached to outbound message.

SentAttachmentsList.description: List of attachments in the application payload.

ServiceProviderId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the service provider.

Status.description: Value that identifies the current state of the collaboration message. Valid values include Hold, Error, or Success.

StatusDate.description: Date when the collaboration message log was created. The value must be in the ISO8601 format.

TestFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then this is a test message. If false, then this is not a test message. This attribute does not have a default value.

TotalAttachments.description: Total number of attachments in the application payload.

TradingPartnerId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the trading partner. It is a primary key that the application generates.

TradingPartnerIdType.description: Value that identifies the type of trading partner. For example, DUNS.

deliveryAttempts.description: The B2B Message Transactions resource manages business-to-business messages processed from Oracle Fusion applications to trading partners and from trading partners to fusion application using Oracle Fusion Collaboration Messaging Framework.
deliveryAttempts.title: Delivery Attempts

receiptConfirmations.description: The B2B Message Transactions resource manages business-to-business messages processed from Oracle Fusion applications to trading partners and from trading partners to fusion application using Oracle Fusion Collaboration Messaging Framework.

DefaultValue.description: Value that specifies the default value of the node identified in the XPath.

IncludeInOutputFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the field should be included in the message. If false, then the field should not be included in the message. The default value is false.

MessageNodeXpath.description: Value that specifies the cross reference path of the external message.

Name.description: Name of the message processing rule.

NodeId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the message processing rule. It is a primary key that the application generates when it creates a message processing rule record. This attribute is required.

ValueRequiredFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then a value is required for a field. If false, then value is not required for a field. This attribute does not have a default value.

ExternalMessageStandardTag.description: Tag used for outbound headers to identify the standard of the partner sending the message.

ExternalMessageTypeTag.description: Tag used for outbound headers to identify the type of partner sending the message.

ExternalMessageVersionTag.description: Tag used for outbound headers to identify the version of the partner sending the message.

FromPartnerIdTag.description: Tag used in protocol headers to identify the partner sending the message.

FromPartnerIdTypeTag.description: Tag used in protocol headers to identify the type of partner sending the message.

ManualEntryIndicator.description: Value that indicates a manual entry. The value is Y when trading partner record is manually entered from the user interface.

ObnId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the Oracle Business Network identifier of the trading partner.

ServiceProviderId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the service provider. This attribute is a foreign key reference to the service provider for a trading partner.

ToPartnerIdTag.description: Tag used in protocol headers to identify the partner to whom the message is being sent.

ToPartnerIdTypeTag.description: Tag used in protocol headers to identify the identifier type of the partner to whom the message is being sent.

TradingPartner.description: Value that uniquely identifies the trading partner name.

TradingPartnerId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the trading partner. It is a primary key that the application generates when it creates a trading partner record. This attribute is required.

TradingPartnerIdType.description: Value that identifies the type of trading partner.

x-links.description:
List of values for the tarding partners of the application partner.

The following properties are defined on the LOV link relation:

  • Source Attribute: TradingPartnerId; Target Attribute: TradingPartnerId
  • Display Attribute: TradingPartner

TradingPartnerId.description: Value that identifies the trading partner

TradingPartner.description: Display value of the trading partner.

limit.description: This parameter restricts the number of resources returned inside the resource collection. If the limit exceeds the resource count then the framework will only return the available resources.

offset.description: Used to define the starting position of the resource collection. If offset exceeds the resource count then no resources are returned. Default value is 0.

totalResults.description: The resource collection representation will include the "estimated row count" when "?totalResults=true", otherwise the count is not included.  The default value is "false".

onlyData.description: The resource item payload will be filtered in order to contain only data (no links section, for example).

dependency.description:
This parameter specifies dependencies which are attributes that are set before and rolled back after generating the response. Generally they are used to preview the effects of an attribute change. The attributes specified in this parameter are always set in the resource instance in question. When a child resource collection is requested and the parameter is set, the attributes will be set in the parent resource instance before generating the resource collection payload. The value of this query parameter is a set of dependency attributes. Example: dependency=ProductId=2

Format: <attr1>=<val1>,<attr2>=<value2>

orderBy.description: This parameter orders a resource collection based on the specified attributes.  The parameter value is a comma-separated string of attribute names, each optionally followed by a colon and "asc" or "desc".  Specify "asc" for ascending and "desc" for descending. The default value is "asc".  For example, ?orderBy=field1:asc,field2:desc

links.description: The link relations associated with the resource instance.

finder.description:
Used as a predefined finder to search the collection.

Format: ?finder=<finderName>;<variableName>=<variableValue>,<variableName2>=<variableValue2>

Default finder: ByServiceProviderFinder

DmVersionNumber.description: Version number that identifies the attachment in repository.

AssociationId.description: Value that uniquely identifies an item-supplier association.

CategoryCode.description: Value that uniquely identifies the item class associated with the item revision extensible flexfield. Review and update the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Item Classes task.

MasterOrganizationId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the master organization. Review and update the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Inventory Organizations task.

OrganizationId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the organization. Review and update the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Inventory Organizations task.

SupplierId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the supplier.

SupplierSiteId.description: Value that uniquely identifies a supplier address. Review and update the value for this attribute using the Suppliers work area, and the Manage Suppliers task.

VersionId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the item version.

Address.description: Address of the supplier. Review and update the value for this attribute using the Suppliers work area, and the Manage Suppliers task.

AddressName.description: Name of the supplier address. Review and update the value for this attribute using the Suppliers work area, and the Manage Suppliers task.

AlternateSupplierNumber.description: Alternate number that identifies the supplier. Review and update the value for this attribute using the Suppliers work area, and the Manage suppliers task.

AssociationId.description: Value that uniquely identifies an item-supplier association.

CreationDateTime.description: Date and time when the user created the item-supplier association.

ItemId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the part, item, product, or service.

ItemSupplierEffCategory.description: The Item-Supplier Associations resource manages the item-supplier associations. Supplier association is the association of an item with a supplier who provides that item; for examples, the association of item CAR with supplier Seven Corporation.
ItemSupplierEffCategory.title: Extensible Flexfields for Item-Supplier Associations

LastUpdateDateTime.description: Date and time when the user most recently updated the item-supplier association.

OrganizationId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the organization. Review and update the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Inventory Organizations task.

PartySiteNumber.description: Number that identifies the supplier site.

PrimaryFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then it is a primary supplier association. If false, then it is not a primary supplier association. The default value is false.
PrimaryFlag.title: Primary

RegistryId.description: Number that uniquely identifies a supplier party. Review and update the value for this attribute using the Suppliers work area, and the Manage Suppliers task.

SupplierExtensibleFlexfieldCategoryCode.description: Value that uniquely identifies the item class associated with the item revision extensible flexfield. Review and update the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Item Classes task.

SupplierId.description: This attribute is not currently used.

CreationDateTime.description: Date and time when the user provided values for translated item attribute values.

HTMLLongDescription.description: Formatted description in rich text or in HTML.
HTMLLongDescription.title: Formatted Description

ItemDescription.description: Description of the part, item, product, or service.
ItemDescription.title: Item Description

ItemId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the part, item, product, or service.

Language.description: Language associated with item long description.

LastUpdateDateTime.description: Date and time when the user most recently updated the translated item attribute values.

OrganizationId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the organization. Review and update the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Inventory Organizations task.

SourceLanguage.description: Language from which the values are translated.

ATPComponentsValue.description: Value that indicates additional components to be included in the bill of material for assemble-to-order (ATO) or pick-to-order (PTO) items in available-to-promise (ATP) checking. A list of accepted values is defined in the lookup type EGP_ORDATPCHECKVS_TYPE. Review the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Standard Lookups task. The default value is None For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

ATPValue.description: Value that indicates the information to check available to promise and or capable to promise when placing demand. A list of accepted values is defined in the lookup type EGP_ORDATPCHECKVS_TYPE. Review the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Standard Lookups task. The default value is None For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

AcceptableEarlyDays.description: Number of days before which the planning process will not reschedule the sales order. For example, if the due date on the original sales order is 10-JUN, and if the Acceptable Early Days is 3, and if the new due date is less than or equal to 13-JUN, then the planning process will not suggest rescheduling. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
AcceptableEarlyDays.title: Acceptable Early Days

AccountingRuleValue.description: Value that indicates the accounting rule to identify special revenue recognition rules for an item. Review and update the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Accounting Rules task. This attribute does not have a default value. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

AllowExpressTransactionsFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then when the quantity to deliver equals the balance on the purchase order line, then deliver all distributions for this item with one data entry transaction. If false, then do not deliver all distributions for the item with one data entry transaction, even if the quantity to deliver equals the balance on the purchase order line. This attribute does not have a default value. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
AllowExpressTransactionsFlag.title: Allow Express Transactions

AllowMaintenanceAssetFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then maintainable assets can be defined for the item. If false, then maintainable assets cannot be defined for the item. The default value is false.
AllowMaintenanceAssetFlag.title: Enable Asset Maintenance

AllowPurchasingDocumentDescriptionUpdate.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then allow the application to update the purchasing document description. If false, then do not allow this update. The default value is true. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
AllowPurchasingDocumentDescriptionUpdate.title: Allow Purchasing Document Description Update

AllowSubstituteReceiptsFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then allow the application to receive a defined substitute instead of the item. If false, then do not allow this substitution. This attribute does not have a default value. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
AllowSubstituteReceiptsFlag.title: Allow Substitute Receipts

AllowSuspendFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then allow suspending of a service contract. If false, then do not allow suspending of a service contract. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
AllowSuspendFlag.title: Allow Suspend

AllowTerminateFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then allow permanent stopping of a service contract. If false, then do not allow permanent stopping of a service contract. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
AllowTerminateFlag.title: Allow Terminate

AllowUnorderedReceiptsFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then allow the application to receive the item without a purchase order. If false, then do not allow this receipt. This attribute does not have a default value. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
AllowUnorderedReceiptsFlag.title: Allow Unordered Receipts

ApprovalStatusValue.description: Value that indicates the approval status of the item. A list of accepted values is defined in the lookup type EGP_APPROVAL_STATUS. Review the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Standard Lookups task. The default value is Approved.

AssembleToOrderFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, the item is generally built for sales order demand and a final assembly work order is created based on sales order details. If false, then assembly work order is not created for the item. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
AssembleToOrderFlag.title: Assemble to Order

AssetCategoryValue.description: Key flexfield structure name for asset category. Review and update the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Key Flexfields task. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

AssetClassValue.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the asset is movable, and needs to be brought into the shop for repairs. If false, then the asset is not movable. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

AssetTrackedFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then item is classified as an asset item. If false, then item is not classified as an asset item. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
AssetTrackedFlag.title: Enable Asset Tracking

AssetTrackedValue.description: Value that indicates the type of asset tracking done on the items. A list of accepted values is defined in the lookup type ORA_EGP_ASSET_TRACKING.

AutoCreatedConfigurationFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then item is created automatically. If false, then item is not created automatically. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
AutoCreatedConfigurationFlag.title: Autocreated Configuration

AutomaticallyExpireASNFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then automatically expire the advance shipment notice. If false, then do not automatically expire the advance shipment notice. The default value is False. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
AutomaticallyExpireASNFlag.title: Automatically Expire ASN

BackOrderableFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then when available-to-promise (ATP) fails, then backorder the item. If false, then do not backorder the item. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
BackOrderableFlag.title: Back Orderable

BackToBackEnabledFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then enable the item for back-to-back ordering. If false, then do not enable the item for back-to-back ordering. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
BackToBackEnabledFlag.title: Back-to-Back Enabled

BaseItemValue.description: Value that uniquely identifies the model to use when creating an assemble-to-order configuration. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

BillingTypeValue.description: Value that indicates the billing types. Values include M, L, or E, where M indicates material, L indicates labor, and E indicates expense. The contract uses the billing type to define the discount percent. A list of accepted values is defined in the lookup type EGP_MATERIAL_BILLABLE_TYPE. Review the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Standard Lookups task. The default value is Null. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

BuildInWIPFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then create discrete jobs or repetitive assemblies in Oracle Manufacturing Cloud. If false, then discrete jobs are not created. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
BuildInWIPFlag.title: Build in WIP

BulkPickedFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then pick items in bulk. If false, then do not pick items in bulk. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
BulkPickedFlag.title: Bulk Picked

BuyerEmailAddress.description: Email of the default buyer that can be associated with the item. Review and update the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Buyers task For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

BuyerOrganizationValue.description: Organization where the buyer resides. Review and update the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Inventory Organizations task. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

CASNumber.description: Value that indicates the Chemical Abstracts Service (CAS) registry number which uniquely identifies a chemical substance. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
CASNumber.title: CAS Number

CarryingCostPercentage.description: Percent of unit cost that represents the internal cost to stock one unit for one year. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
CarryingCostPercentage.title: Carrying Percentage

ChangeNotice.description: Change order associated with the item.

ChangeOrderLineSequenceNumber.description: Number that identifies the change order line associated with the item.

CheckMaterialShortageFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then check for material shortages for the item. If false, then do not check for material shortages for the item. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
CheckMaterialShortageFlag.title: Check Material Shortage

ChildLotEnabledFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then if parent lot is specified, use lot control on the item during the transaction. If false, then do not use lot control on the item during the transaction. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
ChildLotEnabledFlag.title: Child Lot Enabled

ChildLotFormatValidationFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then make sure the child lot numbers conform to the child lot parameters. If false, then do not make sure the child lot numbers conform to the child lot parameters. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
ChildLotFormatValidationFlag.title: Format Validation

ChildLotParent.description: Value that determines how to create child lot numbers for the item. A list of accepted values is defined in the lookup type EGP_PARENT_CHILD_GEN_TYPE. Review and update the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Standard Lookups task. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

ChildLotPrefix.description: Alphabetic prefix to add to the child lot. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
ChildLotPrefix.title: Prefix

ChildLotStartingNumber.description: First number to use in a sequence of numbers for the child lot. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
ChildLotStartingNumber.title: Starting Number

CollateralFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the item is collateral. If false, then the item is not collateral. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
CollateralFlag.title: Collateral

CommonSupplyProjectDemandFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the material can be planned, picked, and issued from common inventory if sufficient inventory does not exist in project inventory. If false, then the material cannot be planned, picked, or issued from common inventory even if sufficient inventory does not exist in project inventory. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, see the Interdependent Item Attributes topic at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
CommonSupplyProjectDemandFlag.title: Allow Use of Common Supplies

CommsActivationRequiredFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the item is eligible for electronic fulfillment by the service fulfillment manager. If false, then the item is not eligible for electronic fulfillment. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
CommsActivationRequiredFlag.title: Enable Provisioning

ConfigModelTypeValue.description: Value that indicates the behavior of the configurable models in the configurator. A list of accepted values is defined in the lookup type EGP_CONFIG_MODEL. Review the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Standard Lookups task. The default value is 1. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

ConsignedFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: True or False. If True, then the item resides at your location but the supplier owns it. If False, then the item resides at your location and you own it. The default value is False. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
ConsignedFlag.title: Consigned

ContainerItemFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then use containers to ship items. If false, then do not use containers to ship items. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
ContainerItemFlag.title: Container

ContainerTypeValue.description: Value that indicates the type of container used for shipping of the item. A list of accepted values is defined in the lookup type EGP_CONTAINER_TYPE. Review the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Standard Lookups task. The default value is Null. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

ContractManufacturingFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then use the item in contract manufacturing. If false, then do not use the item in contract manufacturing. This attribute does not have a default value. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
ContractManufacturingFlag.title: Contract Manufacturing

CopyAssociationsFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then copy the item associations. If false, then do not copy the item associations. The default value is false.

CopyAttachmentsFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then copy the item attachments. If false, then do not copy the item attachments. The default value is false.

CopyCategoriesFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then copy the catalog categories. If false, then do not copy the catalog categories. The default value is false.

CopyFromItemValue.description: Item to use as the source when copying.

CopyFromRevisionValue.description: Item revision of the source when copying the item.

CopyFromVersionValue.description: Item version of the source when copying the item.

CopyItemAndApplyTemplatesFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then copy the item and then apply the template to the item. If false, then do not copy the item and then apply the template to the item. The default value is true.

CopyLotAttributeFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the child lot inherits the parent lot attributes. If false, then the child lot does not inherit the parent lot attributes. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
CopyLotAttributeFlag.title: Copy Lot Attributes

CopyOrganizationAssignmentsFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then copy the organization assignments for the item. If false, then do not copy the organization assignments for the item. The default value is false.

CostingEnabledFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then item costs are reported and accounted. If false, then item costs are not reported and accounted. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
CostingEnabledFlag.title: Costing Enabled

CreateConfiguredItem.description: Value that indicates whether the configured bill of materials can be created based on item or sourcing. A list of accepted values is defined in the lookup type EGP_CONFIG_ORG. Review the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Standard Lookups task. The default value is Null. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

CreateFixedAssetFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then create a depreciable inventory asset for the item when using the installed base. If false, then do not track. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

CreateSupplyFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then suggest supply for this item. If false, then do not suggest supply for this item. The default value is true. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
CreateSupplyFlag.title: Create Supply

CreatedBy.description: User who created the item.

CreationDate.description: Date and time when the application created the item. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

CreationDateTime.description: Date and time when the user created the item revision.

CumulativeManufacturingLeadTime.description: Number of days required to manufacture the item, including the adjusted, cumulative, and total lead time for the component that requires the longest time to assemble. The application subtracts the lead time offset of the operation to adjust each component. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
CumulativeManufacturingLeadTime.title: Cumulative Manufacturing

CumulativeTotalLeadTime.description: Number of days required to assemble the item, including the adjusted, cumulative, and total lead time for the component that requires the longest time to assemble. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
CumulativeTotalLeadTime.title: Cumulative Total

CustomerOrderEnabledFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the item can be ordered by external customers at this point of time. If false, then the item cannot be ordered by external customers at this point of time. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
CustomerOrderEnabledFlag.title: Customer Orders Enabled

CustomerOrderFlag.description: Value that indicates whether to allow an item to be ordered by external customers. Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then Item can be ordered by external customers. If false, then Item cannot be ordered by external customers. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
CustomerOrderFlag.title: Customer Ordered

CustomerSelfServiceEnabledFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the item is enabled for customer self service. If false, then the item is not enabled for customer self service. The default value is false.
CustomerSelfServiceEnabledFlag.title: Enable for Customer Self Service

CycleCountEnabledFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the item is scheduled for automatic cycle count. If false, then the item is not cycle counted. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
CycleCountEnabledFlag.title: Cycle Count Enabled

DaysEarlyReceiptAllowed.description: Number of days that you can receive the item before the promise date occurs without warning or rejection. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
DaysEarlyReceiptAllowed.title: Days Early

DaysLateReceiptAllowed.description: Number of days that you can receive the item after the promise date occurs without warning or rejection. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
DaysLateReceiptAllowed.title: Days Late

DaysOfCover.description: Number of days of cover for the item. The application multiplies Days of Cover by the average demand to calculate the safety stock level. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
DaysOfCover.title: Days of Cover

DefaultBuyerValue.description: Value indicating the default buyer that can be associated with the item. Review and update the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Buyers task. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

DefaultGradeValue.description: Value that indicates default grade for the item. Review and update the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Lot Grades task. The default value is Null. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

DefaultLotStatusValue.description: Internal value that indicates the default lot status for the item. Review and update the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Material Statuses task. The default value is Null. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

DefaultSalesOrderSourceTypeValue.description: Default source type to use for the sales order. A list of accepted values is defined in the lookup type EGP_ORDDEFSOSRCVS_TYPE. Review and update the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Standard Lookups task. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

DefaultSerialStatusValue.description: Internal value that indicates the default serial status of the item. Review and update the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Material Statuses task. The default value is Null. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

DefaultShippingOrganizationValue.description: Value that indicates the primary shipping organization. If item is the source attribute of the warehouse object in the standard value rule set for the order, this is the default organization when creating an order. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

DefaultingControlValue.description: Value that indicates how the conversion between primary and secondary units of measure is handled. Valid values are Default, Fixed, and No Default. You can provide the value of Defaulting Control depending on the value of the Tracking Unit of Measure attribute. If the Tracking Unit of Measure is Primary and Secondary, then the Defaulting Control can be provided. Otherwise, the Defaulting Control cannot be provided. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

DefectTrackingOnFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then defects of the item is tracked. If false, then defects of the item is not tracked. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
DefectTrackingOnFlag.title: Enable Defect Tracking

DemandPeriod.description: Number of days to use when calculating the average daily demand. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
DemandPeriod.title: Demand Period

DemandTimeDays.description: Point in time to ignore forecast demand and to consider only sales order demand when calculating gross requirements. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
DemandTimeDays.title: Demand Time Days

DemandTimeFence.description: Point in time to use when applying restrictions on demand recommendations. A list of accepted values is defined in the lookup type EGP_TIME_FENCE. Review and update the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Standard Lookups task. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

DimensionUOMValue.description: Unit of measure to use for item dimensions. Review and update the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Units of Measures task. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

DownloadableFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the customer can download the item. For example, the item is a software upgrade. If false, then the customer cannot download the item. For example, the item is a desktop computer. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
DownloadableFlag.title: Downloadable

EffectivityControlValue.description: Value that indicates how to calculate lead time based on Date, Model, or Unit Number. A list of accepted values is defined in the lookup type EGP_BOM_EFFEC_CTRL. Review the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Standard Lookups task. The default value is 1. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

ElectronicFormatFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the item exists only in electronic format. If false, then the item does not exist only in electronic format. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
ElectronicFormatFlag.title: Electronic Format

EligibilityRuleFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the item can be made available to customers based on specific requirements and constraints. For example, the customer may need to be a member of the loyalty program, or live in a certain state, or be in good financial standing with the company, or not be locked into an existing contract to be eligible for an offer. If false, then the item can be made available to customers even if they do not meet specific requirements. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
EligibilityRuleFlag.title: Eligibility Rule

EnableContractCoverage.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the item is eligible to be covered in a service contract. If false, then the item is not eligible to be covered in a service contract. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
EnableContractCoverage.title: Enable Contract Coverage

EnableGenealogyTrackingFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the item is enabled for genealogy tracking. If false, then the item is not enabled for genealogy tracking. The default value is false.
EnableGenealogyTrackingFlag.title: Enable Genealogy Tracking

EnableIotFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the asset can be enabled for the Internet of Things (IoT). If false, then the asset cannot be enabled for the IoT. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, see the Interdependent Item Attributes topic at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
EnableIotFlag.title: Enable IOT

EnforceShipToLocationValue.description: Value that indicates an option to control whether the supplier can deliver to a location that differs from the ship to location defined on the purchase order. A list of accepted values is defined in the lookup type EGP_RECEIPTACTIONVS_TYPE. Review the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Standard Lookups task. The default value is None. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

EngineeredItemFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the item is an engineering item. If false, then the item is not an engineering item. The default value is false.
EngineeredItemFlag.title: Engineered

EventFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the item is an event. If false, then the item is not an event. The default value is false. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
EventFlag.title: Event

ExpenditureTypeValue.description: Value for the default expenditure type to be used in project-driven supply chain transactions. Review and update the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Expenditure Types task. The default value is Null. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, see the Interdependent Item Attributes topic at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

ExpirationActionInterval.description: Number of days the application adds to the expiration date before taking an action on the lot. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
ExpirationActionInterval.title: Expiration Action Interval

ExpirationActionValue.description: Internal value that indicates the default action to be taken for this item when the lot expires or the lot fails a quality check. Review and update the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Lot Expiration Actions task. The default value is Null. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

FinancingAllowedFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the customer can finance this item. If false, then the customer cannot finance this item. The default value is null. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
FinancingAllowedFlag.title: Financing Allowed

FixedDaysSupply.description: Number of days to use to modify the size and timing of each planned order quantity. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
FixedDaysSupply.title: Fixed Days Supply

FixedLeadTime.description: Number of days required to assemble an item independent of the sales order quantity, such as setup time or teardown time. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
FixedLeadTime.title: Fixed

FixedLotSizeMultiplier.description: Multiplier to use, in units for each day, for each fixed lot quantity or each repetitive rate. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
FixedLotSizeMultiplier.title: Fixed Lot Size Multiplier

FixedOrderQuantity.description: Quantity to use to modify the size of each planned order quantity or each repetitive daily rate. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
FixedOrderQuantity.title: Fixed Order Quantity

ForcePurchaseLeadTimeFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the  item's purchasing lead time is enforced as a hard constraint. If false, then the item's purchasing lead time is not enforced as a hard constraint. The default value is true.
ForcePurchaseLeadTimeFlag.title: Enforce Purchasing Lead Time

ForecastControlValue.description: Value that uniquely identifies the type of forecast demand to use for the item. A list of accepted values is defined in the lookup type EGP_ATO_FORECAST_CONTROL. Review the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Standard Lookups task. The default value is None. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.

ForecastHorizon.description: Time period to use when forecasting demand for the item. For a list of attribute value interdependencies, refer to Interdependent Item Attributes: Explained at: https://www.oracle.com/pls/topic/lookup?ctx=cloud&id=FAPIM287169.
ForecastHorizon.title: Window Days

ForecastTypelValue.description: Value that uniquely identifies the type of demand for the item. A list of accepted values is defined in the lookup type EGP_ATO_FORECAST_CONTROL. Review the value for this attribute using the Setup and Maintenance work area, and the Manage Standard Lookups task. The default value is None.
