chargeComponents.description: The Charges resource manages price details for the sales order.
chargeComponents.title: Charge Components

ChargeCurrency.description: Name of the currency that the charge component uses.

ChargeCurrencyCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the currency that the charge component uses.

ChargeCurrencyDurationExtendedAmount.description: Extended amount for the duration displayed in the currency that the charge uses.

ChargeCurrencyExtendedAmount.description: Extended amount displayed in the currency that the charge uses. Extended amount equals the unit price multiplied by the quantity on the order line. For a configured item, the extended amount equals the unit price multiplied by the extended quantity on the order line.

ChargeCurrencyUnitPrice.description: Price or adjustment for each unit displayed in the charge currency that the order line uses.

ExplanationMessageName.description: Message name of the explanation that displays in the price break down dialog.

HeaderCurrency.description: Name of the currency that the order header uses.

HeaderCurrencyCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the currency that the order header uses.

HeaderCurrencyDurationExtendedAmount.description: Extended amount for the duration, displayed in the currency that the order header uses.

HeaderCurrencyExtendedAmount.description: Extended amount, displayed in the currency that the order header uses.

HeaderCurrencyUnitPrice.description: Price or adjustment for each unit of the item, displayed in the currency that the order header uses.

OrderChargeComponentId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the transaction.

PercentOfComparisonElement.description: Percent that the unit price constitutes of the basis charge component. The default value for the basis is List Price. This attribute stores the margin percent, the percent that net price constitutes of the list price, and so on.

PriceElement.description: Name of the price element, such as list price, net price, and so on.

PriceElementCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the price element.

PriceElementUsage.description: Name that describes charge component usage.

PriceElementUsageCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the charge component usage.

PricingSourceId.description: Value that identifies the source of the lowest level pricing. For example, it contains the Id that identifies a line on the price list, a tier rule, a shipping line, and so on.

PricingSourceTypeCode.description: Type of the price source, such as the charge of a segment price list. A list of accepted values is defined in the lookup type ORA_QP_SOURCE_TYPES.

RollupFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the value is a rollup value for the charge component. If false, then the value is not a rollup value. For Oracle Fusion application priced orders, the default value is set based on the pricing setup. For pre-priced orders, the default value is false.

SequenceNumber.description: Sequence number for the charge component.

SourceChargeComponentId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the charge component. The source application assigns this value.

SourceMpaId.description: Value that identifies the source of a manual price adjustment.

TaxIncludedFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the price for the charge component includes tax. If false, then the price for the charge component does not include tax. For Oracle Fusion application priced orders, the default value is set based on the pricing setup. For pre-priced orders, the default value is false.

totalComponents.description: The Charge Components resource manages price details for the order line, including price elements and amounts.
totalComponents.title: Total Components

HeaderCurrencyCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the currency that the order header uses.

HeaderCurrencyExtendedAmount.description: Extended amount, displayed in currency that the order header uses.

HeaderCurrencyName.description: Name of the currency that the order header uses.

OrderChargeComponentId.description: Value that identifies the charge component that stores the sales order total. Pricing might use more than one charge component when it calculates the total. For example, it can sum the values of more than one discount when it calculates the total discount.

OrderTotalComponentId.description: Value that identifies the charge component that stores the sales order total.

OrderTotalId.description: Value that identifies the sales order total.

PriceElement.description: Name of the price element. For example, list price, net price, and so on.

PriceElementCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the price element.

PriceElementUsage.description: Name of the price element usage.

PriceElementUsageCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies price element usage.

CoverageFulfillLineId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the fulfillment line that fulfills the coverage line.

CoverageItemNumber.description: Item number of the coverage that the covered item covers.

DisplayLineNumber.description: Number that the order management work area displays to identify the order line that contains the coverage.

HeaderId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the sales order header that contains the coverage.

OrderNumber.description: Sales order number that contains the coverage line.

SourceLineNumber.description: Value that uniquely identifies the order line in the source application that contains the coverage.
SourceLineNumber.title: Source Order Line

SourceOrderNumber.description: Value that uniquely identifies the source order in the source application that contains the coverage.
SourceOrderNumber.title: Source Order

count.description: The number of resource instances returned in the current range.
count.title: Count

hasMore.description: Indicates whether more resources are available on the server than the subset returned in the response. If the value is true, then there are more resources to retrieve from the server. The default value is false.
hasMore.title: HasMore

limit.description: The actual paging size used by the server.
limit.title: Limit

links.description: The link relations associated with the resource instance.
links.title: Items

offset.description: The offset value used in the current page.
offset.title: Offset

CoveredFulfillLineId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the fulfillment line that fulfills the covered item.

CoveredItemNumber.description: Number that identifies the covered item.

DisplayLineNumber.description: Number that the order management work area displays to identify the order line that contains the covered item.

HeaderId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the sales order head that contains the covered item.

OrderNumber.description: Number that identifies the sales order that contains the covered item.

SourceLineId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the source order line from order capture.

SourceLineNumber.description: Value that uniquely identifies the transaction in the source application that contains the order line for the covered item.

SourceOrderId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the source order from order capture.

SourceOrderNumber.description: Number that identifies the source application that contains the covered item.

SourceOrderSystem.description: Value that references to the order capture application that the source order came from.

DocumentSystemReferenceId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the document system for the drop ship.

POHeaderId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the purchase order header for the drop ship.

POLineId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the purchase order line for the drop ship.

POLineLocationId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the location of the purchase order line for the drop ship.

PONumber.description: Number that identifies the purchase order for the drop ship.

DocumentSystemReferenceId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the document system reference for the drop ship.

RequisitionHeaderId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the purchase requisition for the drop ship.

RequisitionLineId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the requisition line for the drop ship.

RequisitionLineNumber.description: Number that identifies the requisition line for the drop ship.

RequisitionNumber.description: Number that identifies the requisition for the drop ship.

DocumentId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the external order reference that the application sends to the fulfillment system.

DocumentLineNumber.description: Number that uniquely identifies the order line in the external order reference that the application sends to the fulfillment system.

DocumentNumber.description: Number that uniquely identifies the external order reference that the application sends to the fulfillment system.

DocumentSystemReferenceId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the document system reference for an external order.

ActiveFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the hold is active. If false, then the hold is not active.
ActiveFlag.title: Active

ApplyDate.description: Date when the user applied the hold.
ApplyDate.title: Hold Date

ApplySystem.description: Application that requested to apply the hold.

ApplyUser.description: Name of the user who applied the hold.

HoldComments.description: Comments that the user added when placing the hold.
HoldComments.title: Comments

HoldInstanceId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the hold.

HoldReleaseComments.description: Comments that the user added when releasing the hold.
HoldReleaseComments.title: Release Comments

HoldReleaseReasonCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the reason for releasing the hold.
HoldReleaseReasonCode.title: Release Reason

ReleaseDate.description: Date when the user released the hold.
ReleaseDate.title: Release Date

ReleaseUser.description: Name of the user who released the hold.

SourceRequestId.description: Value that identifies the source application that requested the hold.

DocumentSystemReferenceId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the document system reference for an internal order.

ActualDeliveryDate.description: Date when the carrier delivered the item that the fulfillment line contains.

AvailabilityShipDate.description: Ship date for each fulfillment line that the carrier sends to order management.

BillOfLadingNumber.description: Contract and receipt from the carrier for the item that the carrier agrees to transport to the destination address.
BillOfLadingNumber.title: Bill of Lading

BillingTransactionDate.description: Date on the customer invoice. The application uses this date to calculate the invoice due date according to the payment terms for the customer.
BillingTransactionDate.title: Invoice Date

BillingTransactionNumber.description: Value that uniquely identifies the billing transaction.
BillingTransactionNumber.title: Invoice Number

CustomerTransactionLineId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the billing line.

DeliveryName.description: Group of items that the carrier carries under the terms of one bill of lading.
DeliveryName.title: Delivery

ExceptionFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the available-to-ship date for the line on the supply order has past the requested date, or supply is not available for the fulfillment line. If false, then this available-to-ship date has not past the requested date, or supply is available for the fulfillment line.

FulfillLineDetailId.description: Value that uniquely identifies details for the fulfillment line.

Quantity.description: Quantity of the item that the supplier fulfilled.
Quantity.title: Shipped Quantity

RMAReceiptDate.description: Receipt date sent by the fulfillment application.

RMAReceiptLineNumber.description: Line number of the receipt sent by the receiving application.

RMAReceiptNumber.description: Receipt header number sent by the receiving application.

StatusCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the status of the fulfillment line.
StatusCode.title: Status

TaskType.description: Task classification that assigns default attributes to tasks and controls task processing.
TaskType.title: Task Type

TrackingNumber.description: Unique value that the carriers provides to track shipment during transportation.
TrackingNumber.title: Tracking Number

TradeComplianceCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the trade compliance screening.

TradeComplianceExplanation.description: Explanation that describes the result of trade compliance screening.

TradeComplianceResultCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the result of trade compliance screening.

TradeComplianceTypeCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the type of trade compliance screening.

WaybillNumber.description: Waybill or airbill number for the shipment.
WaybillNumber.title: Waybill Number

ItemRevisionNumber.description: Value that identifies the item revision.
ItemRevisionNumber.title: Revision Number

ItemSerialNumberFrom.description: Starting serial number of a range of serial numbers.
ItemSerialNumberFrom.title: From Serial Number

ItemSerialNumberTo.description: Ending serial number of a range of serial numbers.
ItemSerialNumberTo.title: To Serial Number

LocatorId.description: Locator where the application ships or receives the item.

LotNumber.description: Identifies the quantity for the item.
LotNumber.title: Lot Number

LotSerialId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the lot and serial.

SourceLotSerialId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the lot and serial. The source application assigns this value.

AdjustmentAmount.description: Amount of the manual price adjustment for a charge or total. The value is an amount or a percent.

AdjustmentElementBasis.description: Basis that pricing uses to calculate the manual pricing adjustment.

AdjustmentElementBasisName.description: Name of the basis that pricing uses to calculate the manual pricing adjustment.

AdjustmentType.description: Method that pricing uses to calculate manual price adjustment for the item.

AdjustmentTypeCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the type of manual price adjustment.

ChargeDefinition.description: Definition of the charge that pricing uses to apply a manual price adjustment.

ChargeDefinitionCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the definition of the charge that pricing uses to apply a manual price adjustment.

ChargeRollupFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then pricing rolls up the charge for the manual price adjustment. If false, then pricing does not do this roll up. For Oracle Fusion application priced orders, the default value is set based on the pricing setup. For pre-priced orders, there is no default value.

Comments.description: Comments that describe the manual price adjustment.

ManualPriceAdjustmentId.description: Value that identifies the manual price adjustment.

ParentEntityId.description: Value that identifies the parent entity where pricing applies the manual price adjustment.

PricePeriodicity.description: Price periodicity of the charge where pricing applies the manual price adjustment.

PricePeriodicityCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the price periodicity of the charge where pricing applies the manual price adjustment.

Reason.description: Reason for the manual price adjustment.

ReasonCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the reason for the manual price adjustment.

SequenceNumber.description: Sequence that pricing uses to apply the manual price adjustment in relation to other manual price adjustments.

SourceManualPriceAdjustmentId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the manual price adjustment. The source application assigns this value.

ValidationStatusCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the validation status of the manual price adjustment.

OriginalFulfillLineId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the fulfillment line from the original sales order that the return order is returning.

OriginalHeaderId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the original sales order header that the return order is returning.

OriginalItemLineNumber.description: Number that identifies the original order line that the return order is returning.

OriginalItemNumber.description: Number that identifies the original item that the return order is returning.

OriginalOrderNumber.description: Number that identifies the original sales order that the return order is returning.

OriginalSourceLineId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the original source line in the return order. This value refers to the original order.

OriginalSourceLineNumber.description: Number that identifies the original source line in the return order. This value refers to the original order.

OriginalSourceOrderId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the original source order in the return order. This value refers to the original order.

OriginalSourceOrderNumber.description: Number that identifies the original source order that the return order is returning. This source order resides in a source application.

OriginalSourceOrderSystem.description: Value that identifies the original source application in the return order. This value refers to the original order.

AuthorizationStatus.description: Authorization status of the payment transaction. Values include Pass or Fail.

AuthorizationStatusCode.description: Status of the payment. Values include Pass or Fail.

AuthorizedInSourceFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then payment authorization occurs in the source application. If false, then payment authorization does not occur in the source application. The default value is true.

AuthorizedOn.description: Date when the application authorized payment.

InstrumentAssignmentId.description: Value that identifies the payment method.

OriginalSystemPaymentReference.description: Value that uniquely identifies the payment details from the source application.

PaymentMethod.description: Name of the billing payment method.

PaymentMethodCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the payment method. The application uses this payment method on the invoice to collect the open balance.

PaymentSetId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the group of payments for one prepaid sales order. If the payment is a prepayment, then this attribute uses a foreign key to reference billing.

PaymentTransactionId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the payment.

PaymentType.description: Name of the payment method for the transaction.

PaymentTypeCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the payment type.

TransactionExtensionId.description: Value that identifies the payment transaction extension in the payment system.

UniquePaymentReference.description: Unique payment reference that the application sends to the payment system for authorization.

AdjustmentName.description: Name of the price adjustment, such as discount, charge, or cost.

AdjustmentTypeCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the type of price adjustment.

Amount.description: Cost amount or charge amount of the price adjustment.
Amount.title: Amount

InvoicedFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the application bills the price adjustment. If false, then the application does not bill the price adjustment.

OrigSystemAdjustmentReference.description: Reference to the price adjustment from the source application.

PriceAdjustmentId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the price adjustment.

ChargeDefinitionCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the pricing charge definition to use during price validation.

ChargeId.description: Value that identifies the charge of the charge component during price validation.

ConstrainingValue.description: Specifies whether validation applies to discount percent or discount amount.

ConstrainingValueTypeCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the type of constraining value, such as percent or amount.

Explanation.description: Explanation that describes the price validation.

ExplanationMessageName.description: Name of the explanation that describes the price validation.

HeaderCurrencyCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the header currency during price validation.

HeaderCurrencyConstrainingAmount.description: Value that constrains the calculation for the header currency during price validation.

ManualPriceAdjustmentId.description: Value that identifies the manual price adjustment during price validation.

PricePeriodicityCode.description: Price periodicity to use recurring prices during price validation.

PriceValidationId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the price validation.

RollupFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then apply validation on a rollup charge. If false, then validation do not apply validation on a rollup charge.

ValidationComponentCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the charge component or total that pricing evaluates for the pricing guideline during price validation.

ValidationComponentEntityId.description: Value that identifies the charge component or total that pricing evaluates for the pricing guideline during price validation.

ValidationComponentEntityType.description: Type of component entity against which the guideline is evaluated. Valid values include Charge Component or Total.

ValidationSourceRuleId.description: Value that identifies the rule that pricing uses to evaluate the pricing guideline during price validation.

ValidationSourceType.description: Type of price validation. Values include Charge Guideline, Total Guideline, Floor Price, or GSA Price.

ValidationSourceTypeCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the source type of the price validation.

ValidationStatus.description: Indicates whether price validation failed or passed.

ViolationTypeCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the violation type that occurred during price validation. A list of accepted values is defined in the lookup type ORA_QP_GUIDE_VIOLATION_TYPES.

DooOrderPrjId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the project for an order line.

projectDetail.description: The Projects resource manages the project details of a sales order line.
projectDetail.title: Project Details

DooOrderPrjId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the project details for an order line.

Percent.description: Value that specifies the sales credit percent for the salesperson.

SalesCreditId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the sales credit.

SalesCreditType.description: Name of the sales credit type.

SalesCreditTypeId.description: Value that identifies the sales credit type.

Salesperson.description: Name of person who sold the item.

SalespersonId.description: Value that identifies the person who sold the item.

SourceTransactionSalesCreditIdentifier.description: Value that uniquely identifies the sales credit. The source application assigns this value.

Address3.description: Third line of the ship-to customer address.

Address4.description: Fourth line of the ship-to customer address.

ContactMiddleName.description: Middle name of the person to contact at the ship-to party site.

ContactNameSuffix.description: Name suffix of the person to contact at the ship-to party site.

PersonLastName.description: Last name of the person to contact at the ship-to customer site.

PersonMiddleName.description: Middle name of the person to contact at the ship-to customer site.

PersonNameSuffix.description: Name suffix of the person to contact at the ship-to customer site.

PersonTitle.description: Title of the person to contact at the ship-to customer site.

PostalCode.description: City of the ship-to customer address.

Province.description: Province of the ship-to customer address.

SiteId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the ship-to customer address.

SourceAddressId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the ship-to customer address. Value is 1.

State.description: State of the ship-to customer address.

CurrencyCode.description: Currency that the sales order total uses.

CurrencyName.description: Name of the currency that the sales order total uses.

DisplayName.description: Display name of the sales order total, displayed in the language that the sales order uses.

EstimatedFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then Oracle Fusion Pricing estimates the total. For example, pricing might estimate total for a usage price. If false, then Oracle Fusion Pricing does not estimate the total.

OrderTotalId.description: Value that uniquely identifies the total for the sales order.

PrimaryFlag.description: Contains one of the following values: true or false. If true, then the total is the primary total. If false, then the total is not the primary total. Each sales order includes only one primary total.

TotalAmount.description: Amount calculated for the sales order total.

TotalCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the definition that defines properties for the sales order total.

TotalGroup.description: Group of related totals. For example, total for a one-time charge, or total for adjustments on a one-time charge.

TotalName.description: Name of the definition that defines properties for the sales order total.

totalComponents.description: The Totals resource manages details for the total price of a sales order.
totalComponents.title: Total Components

HeaderCurrencyCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the currency that the order header uses.

HeaderCurrencyExtendedAmount.description: Extended amount, displayed in currency that the order header uses.

HeaderCurrencyName.description: Name of the currency that the order header uses.

OrderChargeComponentId.description: Value that identifies the charge component that stores the sales order total. Pricing might use more than one charge component when it calculates the total. For example, it can sum the values of more than one discount when it calculates the total discount.

OrderTotalComponentId.description: Value that identifies the charge component that stores the sales order total.

OrderTotalId.description: Value that identifies the sales order total.

PriceElement.description: Name of the price element. For example, list price, net price, and so on.

PriceElementCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies the price element.

PriceElementUsage.description: Name of the price element usage.

PriceElementUsageCode.description: Abbreviation that identifies price element usage.

limit.description: The actual paging size used by the server.

offset.description: The offset value used in the current page.

SummaryLevel.description: Summary level for the inventory balance. Values include None, Organization, Subinventory, or Locator.
